Text: I've seen the comments made on my previous post - sorry it came down, but Bitrocket kept falling over, so I've changed to Bittorrent.  This is the full version, despite its size - I use it all the time.  The rest of the 50mb is manuals, samples, etc

Hmmmmm...

I installed CS3 and now Lightroom is saying I am on 30 day trial.  It was working fine with the SN provided by squ (thanks).

Now it will not accept the same serial number. When I enter the number the next button is still greyed out and there is still a big red X next to the slots where you enter the number.

Any ideas?

I installed CS 3 and lightroom went back to trial mode but I was able to use this serial number again. 
Did you fill in the required fields ie name, email etc?.......I used fake name and email works fine!!
Thank you very much. I really needed this software  and could not afford it.
Can we install 1.1 and have the serial still work?
Yea.  I actually downloaded the Adobe Lightroom 1.1 trial from Adobe's site (this is, of course, after installing and making CS3 work) and used the serial here and it worked fine during install.
I also downloaded from Adobe website and SN worked perfect.  Thank you!
